name: Night Life Agency DC
tag_list: night-life-agency, event-planning, marketing, promotions, dc-night-life, nightlife, clubs, bars-in-dc, nightclubs, parties, djs-in-dc, best-dc-parties, best, dc-nightclubs, best-bars-in-dc, dc-lounges, dc-table-service, new-years, evnets-dc
overview:
Night Life Agency DC- Washington DC’s top promotion company specializing in event planning, marketing and promotions. Best DC nightclubs, DC parties, lounges, Djs, best bars in DC – Night Life Agency.

Founded in 2004, the Night Life Agency has quickly emerged as Washington DC’s premiere event marketing, promotions and production firm. As one of the city’s most successful entertainment and lifestyle marketing conglomerates, the company produces DC’s most popular parties, organizes hundreds of corporate events annually, and manages some of the areas most sought after deejays.

Entrepreneurs with unique backgrounds and expertise, founders Kunal Shah and Vinoda Basnayake have made an indelible mark on DC nightlife, enjoying enduring success in an industry where longevity is rare. The Night Life Agency prides its self in producing events that bring together stunning venues, great music and outstanding service. What started as an events promotions company has now redefined the luxury nightlife experience in DC.
